0eee5df33c2b200496814ed0a2e00e9a56e6e97c.query:
SELECT
                id,
                user_id,
                election_id,
                title,
                description,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM
                voting_guide
            WHERE
                id = ANY ($1)

12a56f4c301c7e877f06dcfa81bffbf26b549d9d.query:
SELECT
                    candidate_id,
                    is_endorsement,
                    note
                FROM
                    voting_guide_candidates
                WHERE
                    voting_guide_id = $1

2324ad04e00ade2289bd36ef06a7eabdaedc9964.query:
SELECT
                id,
                slug,
                title,
                description,
                election_date
            FROM
                election
            WHERE
                election_date > NOW()
            ORDER BY
                election_date ASC
            LIMIT 1

32fa3a2ee0792beb058194ab48e1e0d6690707a3.query:
UPDATE populist_user 
                SET reset_token = $1,
                    reset_token_expires_at = $2
                WHERE email = LOWER($3)

3383aa0b58b6a0da1453acc5117bc18418e6e228.query:
SELECT
                id,
                slug,
                title,
                office_id,
                race_type AS "race_type:RaceType",
                party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                state AS "state:State",
                description,
                ballotpedia_link,
                early_voting_begins_date,
                winner_id,
                official_website,
                election_id,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM
                race
            WHERE
                election_id = $1

378bcb76f24be0d6bb95610121204040c5a98f5f.query:
UPDATE populist_user 
            SET confirmed_at = now() AT TIME ZONE 'utc',
                confirmation_token = NULL
            WHERE confirmation_token = $1 
            AND confirmed_at IS NULL
            RETURNING id

3890dd0b74b9e3a9a8a89a7f25bd8ffeb253d911.query:
SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, first_name, last_name, profile_picture_url FROM user_profile up
            JOIN populist_user u ON up.user_id = u.id WHERE u.id = $1

3ab16ee4c51366cb88c8dc158f24d36c072d2cd1.query: SELECT id, slug, title, description, election_date FROM election WHERE election_date > NOW()

3f0cfdfe223e1df0cfb1d4e45ebff9a93bdea214.query:
SELECT a.id, a.line_1, a.line_2, a.city, a.county, a.state AS "state:State", a.postal_code, a.country, a.congressional_district, a.state_senate_district, a.state_house_district FROM address AS a
            JOIN user_profile up ON user_id = $1
            JOIN address ON up.address_id = a.id

4137cc0c0aa768aae934488f0d0c5deb86683f40.query: SELECT id, slug, title, description, election_date FROM election WHERE slug = $1

604858fafe8b5b14d44db393e5bfb9a5db3fa410.query:
SELECT
                u.id,
                u.username,
                u.email,
                up.first_name,
                up.last_name,
                up.profile_picture_url
            FROM
                populist_user u
                JOIN user_profile up ON u.id = up.user_id
            WHERE
                u.id = $1

722cfb9974f5c78359106ea1754801fb454006b9.query:
UPDATE user_profile SET first_name = $1, last_name = $2
            WHERE user_id = $3
            RETURNING first_name, last_name

7c3de9dc9a7a66c521d2884819f21bde79f41cbb.query: SELECT id FROM populist_user WHERE email = $1

7fcbb56a7901792827468a56e3c6e85b264eb566.query:
SELECT id,
                        slug,
                        first_name,
                        middle_name,
                        last_name,
                        suffix,
                        preferred_name,
                        biography,
                        biography_source,
                        home_state AS "home_state:State",
                        date_of_birth,
                        office_id,
                        thumbnail_image_url,
                        website_url,
                        campaign_website_url,
                        facebook_url,
                        twitter_url,
                        instagram_url,
                        youtube_url,
                        linkedin_url,
                        tiktok_url,
                        email,
                        party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                        votesmart_candidate_id,
                        votesmart_candidate_bio,
                        votesmart_candidate_ratings,
                        legiscan_people_id,
                        crp_candidate_id,
                        fec_candidate_id,
                        upcoming_race_id,
                        race_wins,
                        race_losses,
                        created_at,
                        updated_at FROM politician
                WHERE office_id = $1

8ab1b2b1af80ada2573bdbca3e0538d90e8201b7.query:
INSERT INTO voting_guide_candidates (voting_guide_id, candidate_id, is_endorsement, note)
                VALUES($1, $2, COALESCE($3, FALSE), $4) ON CONFLICT (voting_guide_id, candidate_id)
                DO
                UPDATE
                SET
                    is_endorsement = COALESCE($3, voting_guide_candidates.is_endorsement, FALSE),
                    note = COALESCE($4, voting_guide_candidates.note)
            WHERE (SELECT user_id FROM voting_guide WHERE id = $1) = $5
            RETURNING
                candidate_id,
                is_endorsement,
                note

8c530a0c9163e67b1d4e72157e57d115eef68b40.query:
SELECT id, slug, title, bill_number, legislation_status AS "legislation_status:LegislationStatus", description, official_summary, populist_summary, full_text_url, legiscan_bill_id, history, votesmart_bill_id, b.created_at, b.updated_at FROM bill b
                JOIN bill_sponsors 
                ON bill_sponsors.bill_id = id
                WHERE bill_sponsors.politician_id = $1

8cd9cccc4e11e3f5ac54f881612fdb7c4410542e.query:
SELECT
                a.congressional_district,
                a.state_senate_district,
                a.state_house_district,
                a.state AS "state:State",
                a.county,
                a.city
            FROM
                address AS a
                JOIN user_profile up ON user_id = $1
                JOIN address ON up.address_id = a.id

8fb9036fc4ed3de6039d3e9a7b1c190161316817.query:
SELECT
                r.id,
                r.slug,
                r.title,
                r.office_id,
                r.race_type AS "race_type:RaceType",
                r.party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                r.state AS "state:State",
                r.description,
                r.ballotpedia_link,
                r.early_voting_begins_date,
                r.winner_id,
                r.official_website,
                r.election_id,
                r.created_at,
                r.updated_at
            FROM
                race r
                JOIN office o ON office_id = o.id
            WHERE
                r.election_id = $1
                AND(o.election_scope = 'national'
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'state'
                        AND o.state = $2)
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'city'
                        AND o.municipality = $3)
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'county'
                        AND o.municipality = $4)
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'district'
                        AND o.district_type = 'us_congressional'
                        AND o.district = $5)
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'district'
                        AND o.district_type = 'state_senate'
                        AND o.district = $6)
                    OR(o.election_scope = 'district'
                        AND o.district_type = 'state_house'
                        AND o.district = $7))

93de20a6f00b41aea7ccc24d594baec17dbb2b8c.query:
UPDATE populist_user SET username = $1
            WHERE id = $2
            RETURNING id, email, username, password, role AS "role:Role", created_at, confirmed_at, updated_at

9a729b061294493dec40a66d979fa4bdaa369823.query:
UPDATE populist_user SET email = $1
            WHERE id = $2
            RETURNING id, email, username, password, role AS "role:Role", created_at, confirmed_at, updated_at

a07d35cc871557a18f7072e324420298b53a200d.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    election_id,
                    title,
                    description,
                    created_at,
                    updated_at
                FROM
                    voting_guide
                WHERE
                    election_id = $1 AND
                    user_id = $2

a1ac0218eaa1f3e4985c04528378507a2ba7e631.query: SELECT id, slug, title, description, election_date FROM election WHERE id = $1

a9d971191a04c23d36dcdd69d1872c580ea082c4.query:
DELETE FROM voting_guide
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING
                id

b16a90415ad9c7504dee58ddb432807631c759da.query:
DELETE FROM populist_user WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING id

b5f8bb777be364f196aa0da547e7527cf58249eb.query:
SELECT password FROM populist_user 
            WHERE id = $1

bc6b5601820931b5f6b59c105cf45b569364fd61.query:
SELECT election_date FROM election
            WHERE id = $1

c2c46ee84c24b520439da7dd5b5cbf48794f5b52.query:
UPDATE voting_guide_candidates
            SET note = NULL
            WHERE voting_guide_id = $1 AND candidate_id = $2
            RETURNING
                candidate_id,
                is_endorsement,
                note

c4c08624637ba4861b22af871ca61a43279fb341.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    slug,
                    first_name,
                    middle_name,
                    last_name,
                    suffix,
                    preferred_name,
                    biography,
                    biography_source,
                    home_state AS "home_state:State",
                    date_of_birth,
                    office_id,
                    thumbnail_image_url,
                    website_url,
                    campaign_website_url,
                    facebook_url,
                    twitter_url,
                    instagram_url,
                    youtube_url,
                    linkedin_url,
                    tiktok_url,
                    email,
                    party AS "party:PoliticalParty",
                    votesmart_candidate_id,
                    votesmart_candidate_bio,
                    votesmart_candidate_ratings,
                    legiscan_people_id,
                    crp_candidate_id,
                    fec_candidate_id,
                    upcoming_race_id,
                    race_wins,
                    race_losses,
                    p.created_at,
                    p.updated_at
                FROM
                    politician p
                    JOIN race_candidates rc ON race_id = $1
                WHERE
                    p.id = rc.candidate_id
                    AND rc.is_running = TRUE

d5f7ec0f93752a23eba26f96237ed78d8a41f129.query:
UPDATE user_profile SET profile_picture_url = $1
            WHERE user_id = $2
            RETURNING profile_picture_url

fbe195dc1dc227ee320fa642422a3928f87cf899.query:
INSERT INTO voting_guide (id, user_id, election_id, title, description)
                VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) ON CONFLICT (id)
                DO
                UPDATE
                SET
                    title = $3,
                    description = $4
            RETURNING
                id,
                user_id,
                election_id,
                title,
                description,
                created_at,
                updated_at
